name: Wall Simulator 2017
description:
"Wall Simulator 2017" is a fun arcade wave based game to wall off the illegal aliens from entering the United States.

This game has a Trump Mode and a Hillary mode.
Trump Mode is fun and you build walls to keep the illegals out,
Hillary mode is not fully finished, what it is now is you try to give as many food stamps to illegals as possible.

This game is just for fun, a few laughs and a solid couple hours of fun.

The Walls upgrade from wood to three others.

When you scroll your mouse playing the game you can use the various items, like barb wire, police, springs ex.

This game is pretty much finished, but the more support I get the more I will work and update it.

Once the game is released and its up to the good standards it will be priced around $1 depending on how many features i add between now and then.
